channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I love being debt-free’: I’m in my mid-50s and buying a house. Do I take out a $400K mortgage or use my Roth IRA?
item.description: “I’ll fund $500,000 of that from the sale of my current house.”

item.title: Jeep maker Stellantis facing worst-ever stock rout as it takes $26 billion hit over miscalculating EV demand
item.description: Shares of Stellantis are headed for their worst-ever day of trading after the carmaker announced a massive charge to reset its business.

item.title: Burry says he’s ‘happy’ even as shares of insurer he’s championed, Molina, dive nearly 30%
item.description: “Big Short” investor Michael Burry isn’t the slightest bit deterred by the profit warning at Molina Healthcare.

item.title: Why smart investors are ignoring the 2026 Super Bowl Indicator
item.description: Bulls want the Seahawks; bears cheer the Patriots. You shouldn’t worry if your team loses.

item.title: My brother refuses to sell our family’s $150K lake house, yet I pay all the bills. Do I push it and risk ruining our relationship?
item.description: ”I have no intention of going back to the lake house, yet he expects me to pay for upkeep and taxes.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
